Description: A senior document controller with a civil main contractor typically has the following job responsibilities:1. Overseeing the control and management of all project documentation, including drawings, specifications, contracts, and correspondence.2. Setting up and maintaining a comprehensive document control system that ensures efficient storage, retrieval, and tracking of project documentation.3. Managing the distribution of all project documents to relevant stakeholders, ensuring that the correct revisions and versions are provided.4. Implementing and enforcing document control procedures and protocols to ensure consistency, accuracy, and compliance with industry standards and project requirements.5. Collaborating with project teams, engineers, contractors, and clients to review and approve documents, ensuring they meet project specifications and quality standards.6. Tracking and monitoring document statuses, including review cycles, approvals, and sign-offs.7. Performing document audits to identify any discrepancies, errors, or deficiencies and taking appropriate corrective actions.8. Providing training and guidance to project team members on document control processes and procedures.9. Ensuring the security, confidentiality, and integrity of project documentation, implementing appropriate measures to prevent unauthorized access or modifications.10. Maintaining an organized and up-to-date document library, ensuring easy access to project documentation for internal and external stakeholders.11. Assisting in the preparation of reports, progress updates, and other project-related documents as required.12. Keeping up-to-date with industry trends and advancements in document control technology and recommending improvements or enhancements to existing systems.13. Participating in project meetings and providing updates on document control activities and progress.14. Liaising with subcontractors, suppliers, and regulatory bodies to coordinate document submissions and approvals.Skills
Skills: Candidate must be available in UAE.
